charges.charge_description: 18:842(a)(1) Dealing in Explosive without a License(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant was sentenced and is committed to the BOP as to count 1,2,3 to 10 months, followed by 3 years of supervised release. Defendant shall pay $2,000.00 in fine and $150.00 special assessment due immediately

charges.charge_description: 18:842(j) and 27 CFR Sec. 55.201(f), 55.208(b) - STORING EXPLOSIVES IN A MANNER NOT IN CONFORMITY WITH TREASURY REGULATIONS(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant was sentenced and is committed to the BOP as to count 1,2,3 to 10 months, followed by 3 years of supervised release. Defendant shall pay $2,000.00 in fine and $150.00 special assessment due immediately
